name: Junimo Summer Run
description:
The Junimos are throwing a party, but you're late! The only solution is to use the power of summer to traverse the dangerous but shorter path to the meet up!

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

A / D - Move Left / Right

Space - Jump / Cherry Jump

1 / 2 / 3 - Switch Power (You can do this mid-air!)

L.Shift - Starfruit Dash

L.Ctrl - Fern Swing

ESC - Quit Game
